title: 문장 수준의 흐름 제어
description: 문장 내 여러 도치와 강조를 썼을 때 청자에게 혼동 없이 전달하는 억양과 페이싱을 연습합니다.
examples: Not only was the presentation outstanding, but it was also precisely what the board needed to hear.
So comprehensive was the report that it covered every aspect we had discussed, leaving no questions unanswered.
Rarely have we seen such dedication, and even more rarely have we witnessed such remarkable results.
learning_points: 복잡한 도치 구조에서의 자연스러운 흐름과 명확한 의미 전달

sentences.kr: 프레젠테이션이 뛰어났을 뿐만 아니라, 이사회가 들어야 할 정확한 내용이었다.
sentences.en: Not only was the presentation outstanding, but it was also precisely what the board needed to hear.

sentences.kr: 보고서가 너무 포괄적이어서 우리가 논의한 모든 측면을 다뤘고, 질문을 남기지 않았다.
sentences.en: So comprehensive was the report that it covered every aspect we had discussed, leaving no questions unanswered.

sentences.kr: 그런 헌신을 좀처럼 보지 못했고, 그런 놀라운 결과는 더욱 드물게 목격했다.
sentences.en: Rarely have we seen such dedication, and even more rarely have we witnessed such remarkable results.

sentences.kr: 그 전략이 혁신적이었을 뿐만 아니라, 완전히 실행 가능했다.
sentences.en: Not only was the strategy innovative, but it was also completely feasible to implement.

sentences.kr: 팀워크가 너무 효과적이어서 모든 목표를 달성했고, 예산도 절약했다.
sentences.en: So effective was the teamwork that we achieved all objectives while also saving budget.

sentences.kr: 그런 창의성을 거의 보지 못했고, 그런 실용성은 더욱 드물었다.
sentences.en: Seldom have we observed such creativity, and even less frequently have we seen such practicality.

sentences.kr: 결과가 인상적이었을 뿐만 아니라, 우리의 모든 기대를 초과했다.
sentences.en: Not only were the results impressive, but they exceeded all our expectations.

sentences.kr: 해결책이 너무 우아해서 모든 문제를 해결했고, 새로운 기회도 창출했다.
sentences.en: So elegant was the solution that it resolved all issues while creating new opportunities.
